title: Florida man, 71, sprayed his neighbor in the face with a water gun full of his own urine
text:
Joel Benjamin, 71, has pleaded no contest to a count of misdemeanor battery and was sentenced to 30 days in jail for spraying his neighbor with his own urine

A Florida man has been jailed for repeatedly spraying his neighbor in the face with his own urine from a water pistol.

Gulfport police said in an arrest report that Joel Benjamin, 71, approached the woman on the evening April 13 as she was walking her dog in the 3800 block of 58th Street and squirted her several times with his bodily fluid.

The report says when questioned by police who were called to the scene, Benjamin told officers he would 'do it again.'

In an interview with The Smoking Gun, Benjamin admitted to committing the 'egregious' act because he believed his 50-year-old neighbor had been spying on him for the government.

Benjamin told the site: 'I lost my f***ing temper and shot her in the face with my squirt gun filled with p***.'

According to police, the victim was no physically harmed by the revolting stunt.

The woman was walking her dog in the 3800 block of 58th Street in Gulfport, Florida, on April 13 when Benjamin confronted her

Benjamin had filled a water pistol with his own urine and sprayed the neighbor in the face a few time, later telling police he would 'do it again' (stock image)

On October 3, Benjamin pleaded no contest to a misdemeanor count of battery and was sentenced to 30 days in jail, followed by a one-year probation.

Under the conditions of the plea deal, the man must pay nearly $1,000 in fines and have no contact with the victim.

Benjamin is expected to be released on October 22.
description: Joel Benjamin, 71, has pleaded no contest to a count of misdemeanor battery and was sentenced to 30 days in jail for the urine-filled squirt gun attack on his female neighbor in April.
